course_title: Topics In Computer Science: Adaptive Machine Learning
class_notes: This course covers advanced machine learning topics involved in the development of robust and adaptive machine learning algorithms that incorporate topics including domain adaption, online learning: bandit/multi-bandits, and control theory for data-driven systems.
sections: Class Nbr: 1903, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 4:20-5:35p, Instructor: R. Kamaleswaran, Status: Open
